tests.name: very short example test
tests.output: The longest sequence with continuous even numbers is: 0

tests.name: Always take first sequence from seqs with most consecutive nums
tests.output: The longest sequence with continuous even numbers is: 2 4 6

tests.name: Only take sequence of numbers getting bigger
tests.output: The longest sequence with continuous even numbers is: 2 4 6 8

tests.name: Make sure even num that breaks a sequence starts a new one (in this case, 0)
tests.output: The longest sequence with continuous even numbers is: 0 2 4 6

tests.name: Max int test
tests.output: The longest sequence with continuous even numbers is: 2147483640 2147483642 2147483644 2147483646

tests.name: Negative numbers test
tests.output: The longest sequence with continuous even numbers is: -8 -6 -4 -2 0

tests.name: Negative numbers harder test
tests.output: The longest sequence with continuous even numbers is: -8 -6 -4

tests.name: min int test
tests.output: The longest sequence with continuous even numbers is: -2147483648 -2147483646 -2147483644 -2147483642 -2147483640

tests.name: Mix of negative and positive numbers test
tests.output: The longest sequence with continuous even numbers is: -4 -2 0 2 4
